DOC.brief_summary: Unmask Trial aims to evaluate the Kappa concordance between immunochemistry and molecular biology to detecting cancer cells in sentinel lymph node in patients undergoing colectomy for non metastatic colon cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Ex-vivo Sentinel Lymph Node in Stage I-II Colon Cancer: Kappa Analysis With Immunochemistry and Molecular Biology
DOC.criteria: Colectomy for Non metastatic colon cancer Tumor T4 No medical insurance Pregnant woman Psychiatric disorders
